ModMetaData.name: RimTalk DynamicColors 边缘世谭-言出多彩
ModMetaData.author: Maiya0126
ModMetaData.description:
[b]RimTalk DynamicColors (言出多彩)[/b]
A tailored enhancement mod for RimTalk and Interaction Bubbles. 专为 RimTalk 打造的沉浸式色彩增强模组。
[b]✨ All features can be toggled freely in Mod Settings.[/b] [b]✨ 所有功能均可在 Mod 设置里自由开关。[/b]
[h1]⚠️ Load Order / 加载顺序[/h1] 1. Harmony 2. Interaction Bubbles 3. RimTalk 4. [b]RimTalk DynamicColors[/b] (This Mod)
[h1]Features / 功能[/h1] [b]1. Dynamic Character Colors (角色专属色)[/b] Set custom colors for specific pawns. Supports Ideology "Favorite Color" auto-apply. 为角色设置专属颜色，支持自动应用文化DLC的“最爱颜色”。
[b]2. Immersive Actions (沉浸式动作)[/b] Text inside brackets (), **, [] will be dimmed or italicized to distinguish actions from speech. 括号内的动作描写会自动变暗或变为斜体。
[b]3. Bubbles Sync (气泡同步)[/b] All colors and styles sync perfectly to Interaction Bubbles! 所有颜色特效完美同步显示在头顶气泡中！
[b]4. History & Export (历史与导出)[/b] View chat history in-game and export to TXT or HTML files. 内置历史记录查看器，支持导出为 TXT 或 HTML（带颜色）文件。
[h1]New Items / 新增物品[/h1] Craftable at Crafting Spot: [b]🍬 Rainbow Candy:[/b] Makes your speech rainbow-colored! (说话变成动态彩虹色) [b]💊 B&W Pill:[/b] Makes speech high-contrast black & white. (说话变成黑白风格) [b]🍵 Clear Soup:[/b] Removes color effects. (清除特效)
[h1]FAQ[/h1] [b]Error: "Json deserialization failed"?[/b] This is caused by the AI model generating bad data, not this mod. Please ignore it. 这是AI模型偶尔抽风输出错误格式导致的，不是Mod的问题，请直接忽略。
